years: (20)[int] - amount of years for the project, for now not available (years)
shift_edem: (0 or 1)[bool] - if the energy demand can be shifted to get better results, shifted -1 and +1 hour (-)
shifts: either 0, 1, 2 or 3 - number of shifts used in the company, can only be 0 if edem is a vector (-)
edem: ([2.544, 1.32525,...] or 609584.869)[[float] or float] - energy demand, either a vector consisting of values or the total demand as one value (kW)
WACC: (0.086)[float] - weighted average cost of capital (percent as decimal from 0 to 1)
max_area_PV: (10000.0)[float] - area available for the PV system (m^2)
max_area_WT: (10000.0)[float] - area available for the WT system (m^2)
max_height_WT: (15.5)[float] - maximum height for the WT system, for now not available (m)
